name: Azhdaha
desc:
An enormous dragon as ancient as the mountains themselves.
In an age that has all but faded from memory, he stood shoulder to shoulder with one who ruled over a harbor of stone. But in the end, the two came into conflict, and the dragon was banished to a dark place deep underground. Over the long years of his imprisonment, his power has slowly dissipated. He has also become disfigured from the various kinds of erosion he has been subjected to.
The faint rattling of this dragon lord's shackles and his deep, angry growl echo through the bowels of the mountains like memories of a bygone era.

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Dream Solvent
dropMaterial.desc:
An item capable of changing Character Level-Up Materials obtained from memories and trials into whatever form is needed.
People once believed that spirits and memories had some material form. If someone dreamed of heaven before waking up clutching a flower, then that blossom must have been made from such a fantasy. Dream Solvent dissolves that which is obtained from memory and transforms it into some other dream.
Indeed, blows traded with the strong are stepping stones towards becoming stronger yourself.

dropMaterial.name: Northlander Bow Billet
dropMaterial.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star bows.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

dropMaterial.name: Northlander Catalyst Billet
dropMaterial.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star catalysts.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

dropMaterial.name: Northlander Claymore Billet
dropMaterial.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star claymores.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

dropMaterial.name: Northlander Polearm Billet
dropMaterial.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star polearms.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

dropMaterial.name: Northlander Sword Billet
dropMaterial.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star swords.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

dropMaterial.name: Dragon Lord's Crown
dropMaterial.desc:
Horns created from hardened jade crystallized over a thousand years are the natural crown of the dragon king.
Infused with spirit and carved from bedrock, it was born from the mountain's heart to show the strength of the earth to the land amidst monoliths, and its long golden horns are the mark of its ancient strife with an ancient lord.
For a time, this horn was shattered and lost its luster, but now it gleams cold and gold as it sits in your palm.

dropMaterial.name: Bloodjade Branch
dropMaterial.desc:
Nurtured by the might of the dragon king, these bone branches glitter with strange, unique colors.
Hatred coursed through the natural streams and kissed the cold moonlight, and from them were these crystalline branches born and grown...
Even though they were severed in battle, these branches steeped in dragon blood rustle as if eternally ill-at-ease.

dropMaterial.name: Gilded Scale
dropMaterial.desc:
Scaled armor that grows naturally over mystical stone, tough and silent, and filled with the strength of the dragon king.
Across the years as countless generations returned to the mulch of the earth, gold and obsidian embedded themselves into flesh and blood forged from bedrock before spreading and turning into scales.
Searing agony, wordless cries... perhaps they will all vanish when the grudges that spawned them, too, finally come to an end.

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazurite Sliver
dropMaterial.desc: Character Ascension Material.

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazurite Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains."

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazurite Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains.
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods..."

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazurite Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains.
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods... Only laws and the Tribunal can judge someone.
They can judge even me. So praise my magnificence and purity."

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Amethyst Sliver
dropMaterial.desc: Character Ascension Material.

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Amethyst Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world."

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Amethyst Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.
It should hold absolute control over this world."

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Amethyst Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.
"It should hold absolute control over this world.
"It once promised its people a dream: the never-changing 'eternity.'"

dropMaterial.name: Shivada Jade Sliver
dropMaterial.desc: Character Ascension Material.

dropMaterial.name: Shivada Jade Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry..."

dropMaterial.name: Shivada Jade Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry..."
"...to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world."

dropMaterial.name: Shivada Jade Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry... to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world.
"Since you could endure my bitter cold, you must have the desire to burn?
"Then, burn away the old world for me."

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Sliver
dropMaterial.desc: Character Ascension Material.

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name..."

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name...
Burnt to cinders for a dream."

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name...
Burnt to cinders for a dream.
If the intention yet remains, achieved ██'s truth he has."

dropMaterial.name: Prithiva Topaz Sliver
dropMaterial.desc: Character Ascension Material.

dropMaterial.name: Prithiva Topaz Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood."

dropMaterial.name: Prithiva Topaz Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.
For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future."

dropMaterial.name: Prithiva Topaz Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.
For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future.
This is the trust I have placed in them. Betray it, and you taint my blood."

value.name: Azhdaha
value.desc: Elemental life form whose lifespan far exceeds that of mankind, brought by Rex Lapis to the surface. Morax carved him into a dragon and gave him eyes to see the sun. Azhdaha had been a friend and ally of the Geo Archon for many years.

value.name: Azhdaha
value.desc:
Ancient Geovishap Ancestor: Azhdaha

The faint rattling of this dragon lord's shackles and his deep, angry growl echo through the bowels of the mountains like memories of a bygone era.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Sternest of Souls</color>
Defeat Azhdaha in all its forms.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>The Finishing Touch</color>
Defeat Azhdaha without ever having gained a shield.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Blast from the Past</color>
Defeat Azhdaha in Co-Op Mode.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.
